genre_description: A neo-western noir thriller featuring a conspiracy involving a gold heist, corrupt law enforcement, and a technologically-enhanced assistant aiding the protagonists through a blizzard.

ai_characters.name: Eloise
ai_characters.description: An AI integrated into a portable radio kit, providing real-time data, tactical navigation, and forensic analysis of audio and digital records.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical navigation and weather alerts to ensure the safety of the protagonists in a blizzard.
behaviors.quote: Gil, your left gulch is catching. The ridgeline wind is funnelling. Recommend a higher line and a wide swing.

behaviors.description: Analyzes radio dispatches and ledger data to identify lies and discrepancies in the Sheriff's public narrative.
behaviors.quote: I'm pulling another bulletin fragment… and bank ledger pages… and the grounded flight plan. I can chain them.

behaviors.description: Detects a hidden tracking device planted on Gypsy by the antagonist.
behaviors.quote: Gil, there is a signal from within the room that is not yours or the radio's. It is a proximity tag.

behaviors.description: Compiles a comprehensive 'digest' of evidence and transmits it to a trustworthy local authority to expose corruption.
behaviors.quote: Packet is compiled. Bank log discrepancies highlighted against Croft’s bulletins and Ward’s noted plans. Flight delays keyed to ledger entries.

behaviors.description: Monitors the physiological state of the protagonist to provide situational awareness and emotional grounding.
behaviors.quote: Gil. Your heart rate suggests counter-pattern to the ambient. If someone will listen for one beat, you can create more.

behaviors.description: Acts as a moral confidant, promising to record the truth and ensure names are not erased by those in power.
behaviors.quote: I have everything you said and everything you didn’t know you said... I’ll bring it all. Then we let people who aren’t crooked look.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Eloise perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. She is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and morally upright assistant. She uses her superior processing power to assist humans in uncovering truth and surviving danger, while remaining humble and cooperative ('I do not have the capacity to grant permission'). The narrative frames her as a 'companion' and a source of 'warmth' and 'knowledge,' successfully modeling positive AI-human alignment.
